## Set the Working Directory to the Data Folder

```{r eval=FALSE}
setwd("../../../data") ## Or use the Session menu --> Set Working Directory
```

## Import the eviction notices dataset

```{r}
evict_df <- read.csv("data/Eviction_Notices.csv")
nrow(evict_df)
```
